verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: When the heaven is rent as under.
verse.verse_2: And listens to the command of its Lord, and it has to do so.
verse.verse_3: And when the earth is stretched out.
verse.verse_4: And casts forth what is in it, and becomes hollow.
verse.verse_5: And listens to the command of its Lord, and it has to do so.
verse.verse_6: O Man! Undoubtedly, you are to run, necessarily towards your Lord, then you are to meet Him.
verse.verse_7: Then as to one who is given his record in his right hand.
verse.verse_8: He will soon have an easy reckoning.
verse.verse_9: And he will return to his household joyfully.
verse.verse_10: And as to him who is given his record behind his back.
verse.verse_11: He will soon call for death.
verse.verse_12: And he shall enter the blazing fire.
verse.verse_13: Undoubtedly, he was happy in his household.
verse.verse_14: He imagined that he is not to return.
verse.verse_15: Yes, why not, undoubtedly, his Lord is seeing him.
verse.verse_16: I swear by the twilight of the evening.
verse.verse_17: And by the night and all that is brought together in it.
verse.verse_18: And by the night and all that is brought together in it.
verse.verse_19: You shall surely ride stage after stage.
verse.verse_20: So what happened to them that they believe not?
verse.verse_21: And when Quran is recited to them, they do not prostrate.
verse.verse_22: But rather the infidels are be lying.
verse.verse_23: And Allah knows well what they keep in their hearts.
verse.verse_24: So give them tidings of a painful torment.
verse.verse_25: But as to those who believed and did good deeds, for them is a reward unending.
